project.ss.lang.gu.prepro
Interface PreProcessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
PreProcessorImpl
public interface PreProcessor

This interface describes the functionality of Preprocessor. The Preprocessor is the one in TTS systems which resolves the ambiguity involved in input text string for the later stages of TTS system. The ambiguity in the text can be e.g., 123, Mr. etc. Such text sequence in the input text doesn't maps to any single sound utterance and possesses the different sounds when read. i.e., 123 One hundred twenty three Mr. Mister. etc. etcetra Such whole set of ambiguity is resolved by Preprocessor. This interface is language specific and should be developed for each language separately. Single method PreProcess () with two overloaded versions is used to get the preprocessed strings.
